main event: A UFO sighting occurred on December 6, 1954, in Baltimore, Maryland, where the object moved in an erratic flight and changed color from white to orange.
interesting points: The UFO changed colors from white to orange during the sighting., The object appeared to stand still at times., The observation was classified as ground-visual., The report offers no electronic data or flight path information., The conclusion suggested that it was probably a balloon or possibly human.
witness description: details not provided in the report
